file.name: marketplace-swagger.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  description: |
    marketplace 接口文档.
  version: "2.2.0"
  title: Erda Marketplace
  contact:
    email: rainchan365@163.com
servers:
  - url: 'https://openapi.dev.terminus.io'
tags:
  - name: gallery
    description: gallery

paths:
  /api/opus-types:
    get:
      tags:
        - gallery
      summary: 查询所有 opus 类型
      description: 查询所有 opus 类型
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
          content:
            "application/json":
              schema:
                allOf:
                  - $ref: "#/components/schemas/BaseResponse"
                type: object
                properties:
                  "data":
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      "total":
                        description: 数量
                        type: integer
                      "list":
                        description: 列表
                        type: array
                        items:
                          $ref: "#/components/schemas/OpusType"

  /api/opus:
    get:
      tags:
        - gallery
      summary: 查询组织下所有的 gallery 资源
      description: 查询组织下所有的 artifacts 资源 (extensions 和 上架的项目制品)
      parameters:
        - name: type
          in: query
          description: 根据 type 可筛选 artifacts 类型; 不传时查询所有类型
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            enum:
              - erda/extension/action
              - erda/extension/addon
              - erda/artifacts/project
            example: "erda/extension/addon"
        - name: name
          in: query
          description: artifact 名称
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: keyword
          in: query
          description: 搜索关键字
          x-todo: 搜索什么字段
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: ""
        - name: withPresentation
          in: query
          description: 返回结构是否要携带 presentation 字段, 为 false 时 presentation 仅包含列表所需信息
          required: false
          schema:
            type: boolean
            default: false
        - name: withPublication
          in: query
          description: 返回结构是否要携带 publication 字段
          required: false
          schema:
            type: boolean
            default: false
        - name: withInstallation
          in: query
          description: 返回结构是否要携带 installation 字段
          required: false
          schema:
            type: boolean
            default: false

        - name: pageNo
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 20
        - name: pageSize
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 1
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                allOf:
                  - $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
                type: object
                properties:
                  data:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      "total":
                        description: 数量
                        type: integer
                      "list":
                        description: 列表
                        type: array
                        items:
                          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Opus"

  /api/opus/{id}/actions/gen-shared-url:
    parameters:
      - name: name
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
    post:
      tags:
        - gallery
      summary: 生成页面分享查看链接
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/GenerateSharedURL"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            "application/json":
              schema:
                allOf:
                  - $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
                properties:
                  "data":
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      "name":
                        type: string
                      "version":
                        type: string
                      "url":
                        type: string

components:
  schemas:
    BaseResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        success:
          type: boolean
        err:
          type: object

    Opus:
      type: object
      properties:
        "id":
          type: string
        "createdAt":
          type: string
          format: date-time
        "updatedAt":
          type: string
          format: date-time
        "orgID":
          type: string
        "orgName":
          type: string
        "creatorID":
          type: string
        "updaterID":
          type: string
        "type":
          type: string
        "name":
          type: string
        "version":
          type: string
        "displayName":
          type: string
        "summary":
          type: string
        "labels":
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        "catalog":
          type: string
        "logoURL":
          type: string
        "checkValidURL":
          type: string
        "isValid":
          type: boolean
        "presentation":
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Presentation"
        "publication":
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Publication"
        "installation":
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Installation"
        "syntax":
          type: string

    Presentation:
      type: object
      properties:
        "desc":
          type: string
        "contactName":
          type: string
        "contactURL":
          type: string
        "contactEmail":
          type: string
        "isOpenSourced":
          type: boolean
        "opensourceURL":
          type: string
        "licenseName":
          type: string
        "licenseURL":
          type: string
        "homepageName":
          type: string
        "homepageURL":
          type: string
        "isDownloadable":
          type: boolean
        "downloadURL":
          type: string
        "readme":
          type: string
        "ref":
          type: string

    Publication:
      type: object

    Installation:
      type: object

    Info:
      type: object
      properties:
        "name":
          type: string
        "displayName":
          type: string
        "type":
          type: string
        "version":
          type: string
        "summary":
          type: string
        "description":
          type: string
        "contact":
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Contact"
        "opensource":
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Opensource"
        "logoURL":
          type: string
        "homepage":
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Homepage"

    Download:
      type: object
      properties:
        "downloadable":
          type: boolean
        "url":
          type: string

    Readme:
      type: object
      properties:
        "lang":
          type: string
        "langName":
          type: string
        "source":
          type: string
        "text":
          type: string

    Parameters:
      type: object
      properties:
        "ins":
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        "parameters":
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Parameter"

    Contact:
      type: object
      properties:
        "name":
          type: string
        "url":
          type: string
        "email":
          type: string

    Opensource:
      type: object
      properties:
        "isOpenSourced":
          type: boolean
        "url":
          type: string
        "license":
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/License"

    Homepage:
      type: object
      properties:
        "name":
          type: string
        "url":
          type: string
        "logURL":
          type: string

    Parameter:
      type: object
      properties:
        "name":
          type: string
        "in":
          type: string
        "description":
          type: string
        "style":
          type: string
        "explode":
          type: boolean
        "allowEmptyValue":
          type: boolean
        "allowReserved":
          type: boolean
        "deprecated":
          type: boolean
        "required":
          type: boolean
        "schema":
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Schema"

    License:
      type: object
      properties:
        "name":
          type: string
        "url":
          type: string

    Schema:
      type: object
      properties:
        "type":
          type: string
        "title":
          type: string
        "format":
          type: string
        "description":
          type: string
        "deprecated":
          type: boolean
        "items":
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Schema"
        "required":
          type: boolean
        properties:
          type: object
          additionalProperties:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Schema"

    Form:
      type: object
      properties:
        "title":
          type: string
        "headers":
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        "lines":
          type: array
          items:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string

    OpusType:
      type: object
      properties:
        "name":
          type: string
          description: 类型标识
        "displayName":
          type: string
          description: 类型名称

  requestBodies:
    GenerateSharedURL:
      content:
        "application/json":
          schema:
            type: object
            properties:
              "name":
                type: string
              "version":
                type: string
      required: true

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /api/opus/{id}/actions/gen-shared-url: post: parse path: path parameter not specified: "id"
